references.paper_title: Single-shot compressive spectral imaging with a dual-disperser architecture
references.reason: This paper is foundational for snapshot compressive imaging (SCI), introducing a dual-disperser architecture for single-shot spectral imaging, a significant advance in the field.
This paper expands SCI to the temporal domain, enabling video compressive sensing, a crucial development for high-speed video applications.

references.paper_title: Snapshot compressive imaging: Theory, algorithms, and applications
references.reason: This review paper provides a comprehensive overview of SCI, covering the theory, algorithms, and applications of the field.
This paper introduces the concept of deep image prior (DIP), which is foundational to the use of untrained neural networks (UNNs) for solving inverse problems, a central theme in this paper.

references.paper_title: Deep decoder: Concise image representations from untrained non-convolutional networks
references.reason: This paper introduces the Deep Decoder, another UNN architecture used for image reconstruction without requiring training data, relevant to the methods explored in the current paper.
